artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Light and medum shades of blue and green warp and weft.  Plain weave variation. Right Selvedge.  Tag stapled to pc: HUY/23/2. Stapled to 8.5x11" card with 99.1.1213.11,12,& 13.  "H-8B" written on card. Some notes on reverse.
title: Lapis Development Sample
